a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Average performance of 15 year olds on the mathematics scale
Assessed through the PISA mathematics scale, which is based on an OECD country mean of 500 points and a standard deviation
PISA: Average mathematics score for boys
PISA: Average mathematics score for girls
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
